amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the issuance of export licenses for any defense article or service as described in 22 enumerated certification transmittal documents designated by the Department of State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to prohibit the use of funds for the issuance of export licenses for any defense article or service as described in 22 enumerated certification transmittal documents designated by the Department of State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A106) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 191 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: Amendment (A106) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
